sentences.sContent: a doctor who has been accused of professional misconduct
sentences.sCn: 被指控玩忽职守的医生

sentences.sContent: He was fired for serious misconduct .
She was found guilty of gross misconduct (= very serious misconduct ) .
sentences.sCn: 她被裁定犯有严重失职罪。

phrases.pCn: 故意的不良行为 条约法律；渎职

trans.tranOther: bad or dishonest behaviour by someone in a position of authority or trust
